subject: Re: Ghost Box Success Rate
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
That's the trouble with this, is like you said, alot of the conclusions people make are arbitrary, because not all the EVPs are crystal clear.  However, there are many EVPs that *are* crystal clear, and the good part about that is that EVERY additional one of these shoots the evidence up through the roof, because like you said, if it was "just coincidence" then the radio making sense with you should happen next to never...  

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Then---There's the problem, or an apparent problem, that no one hears the
> voices the same. Plus, if you think there's nothing to it, ya don't hear it,
> so you have to have like an allowing going on.  I don't know how many
> hundreds of test videos and waves I've posted that I think are perfectly
> clear and understandable and not one comment. People claim to listen but
> vary rarely does anyone say they heard the same thing. It seems to be a
> personal experience at best, with just enough so others are convinced there
> is something to it.  Maybe I'm just Alice chasing the rabbit. Intriguing and
> disappointing at the same time.
> 
>  F-S
>
